name: Jenny's Jazz Revolution
description:
Jenny's Jazz Revolution (JJR) is coming to revolutionise the way we play games, with unconventional controls, a vast library of music and sick beats! Your living room will never be the same. 

JJR allows you to improve your health and fitness through dance, music and connection with other dancers in the JJR community. 

Apart from the visuals, JJR also includes integrated dance pad controls, a proprietary piece of hardware designed by the award-winning team at JJR Studios. No dance pad, no fear - you can also use standard keyboard controls.

Upcoming features in our next release include a sophisticated algorithm that will run through any song you want and create a beat map for you, which you can share with the online JJR community. 

Download the game here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1sD43VymXwfFInPOvQor1cRsN_v2Gmkln/view?usp=shari...
